Description:
Manage all of the screening resumes and applications by filtering them as per the requirements and shortlisting them.
Interviewing candidates on the shortlist and maintaining a database of employees for future vacancies.
Arranging for interviews with the managers and setting a suitable time for them for the panel interview.
Work with the recruitment team in organizing and administrating recruitment campaigns and programs to ensure the sourcing of applicants within the approved manpower forecast, internship program, and the company’s Saudization program.
Consider Saudization and NITAQAT status in terms of recruiting Saudis.
Arranging job advertisements on the company career webpage and in various portals.
Perform reference and background checks on applicants’ selection.
Keeps records, metrics and compiles statistical reports concerning recruitments, interviews, hires, and transfers.
Formulating detailed job descriptions and posting ads in various portals.
Prepare various methods to evaluate candidates, including structured interviews, technical assessments, and behavioral questions. Sharing offer letters to candidates and negations on the package.
On-boarding of selected candidates and completion of registration in Government records.
Maintaining Complete records regarding the Hiring Process. E.g., JDs, CVs, Offer letters, appointment letters, etc.Skills
Skills:
5+ years of experience as a Recruiter or similar role. (Mandatory).
University Degree in HR-related field, Psychology, Economics, or Engineering.
Experience using LinkedIn Recruiter and other search engines and job boards and platforms, have an established candidate network.
Experience in using an Application Tracking System (ATS), ideally a Workday.
The ability to develop strong working relationships and maintain work ethics.
Fluent in Arabic & English (Bilingual) (Verbal & Written).
Strong communication and collaboration skills.
Ability to manage a heavy volume of job requisitions and work in a fast-paced, ever-changing environment.
Exceptional sourcing skills.
Proactive and self-disciplined.
Energetic, enthusiastic, and confident.
Proficiency in Microsoft Office with demonstrated abilities in Excel.
Expert level experience in multitasking with the ability to set priorities as per the given situation
